name: Demon Tea
description:
Demon Tea is a  short game about a young demon, that's trying to find a home. 
This game was created  in RPG Maker VX Ace for the ShortnSweet Jam. 
The game game has one ending and is very short. 

Update 8 September, 2017:
Korean Translated version is up. 
Korean Translations by KyleHeren

Update 30 August, 2017:
Traditional Chinese version is up. 
Traditional Chinese Translation by Sikv
